Name: Granta Sedan
Description: Contemporary, technologically sophisticated, fast-paced, and stylish – just what a car should be.

Name: Granta Liftback
Description: A dynamic style and streamlined shape are the trademark of a vehicle with a sporty personality. The Granta liftback is also stunningly spacious.

Name: Granta Station Wagon
Description: As inferred by the term station wagon, the LADA Granta features an inherent breadth of character, as well as versatility and a focus on practicality.

Name: Granta Cross
Description: Compact crossover. Roomy station wagon. Stylish city dweller. All this is LADA Granta Cross.

Name: Vesta Sedan
Description: Spacious and well-equipped, elegant and practical – the Vesta is extraordinary in every way.

Name: Vesta Cross
Description: The Vesta Cross embodies love for the sedan and the ultra-popular crossover.

Name: Vesta SW
Description: A chic, spacious, comfortable station wagon. A contemporary combination of elegance and practicality.

Name: Vesta SW Cross
Description: One of a kind. The LADA Vesta SW Cross combines a bold design, the versatility of a crossover, and a practical body.

Name: XRAY
Description: Quick off the mark, energetic, and optimistic. A compact crossover, ideal for city life.

Name: XRAY CROSS
Description: The crossover – new discoveries, vivid emotions, and a comfortable, reliable vehicle for everyday life.

Name: Niva Legend 3 doors
Description: The LADA Niva Legend has a distinctive style and is renowned for its cross-country ability.

Name: Niva Legend 5 doors
Description: Difficult road conditions. The tightness of city blocks. This is the habitat of LADA Niva Legend

Name: Niva Travel
Description: LADA Niva Travel is the power of an all-wheel drive and constant readiness for adventure. Adventure in comfort.

Name: Largus Station Wagon
Description: An explorer, a business partner, and a family member – the LADA Largus is comfortable, vibrant, and functional.

Name: Largus Cross
Description: The top-of-the-range model from the Largus family: providing comfort, excellent cross-country ability, and a vivid Cross-design.

Name: Largus Van
Description: The LADA Largus Van combines versatility with a contemporary, expressive design. One of its tasks is to create a positive image and showcase the status of a company and entrepreneur. Its calibrated proportions, sleek lines, and trademark LADA design show that it is not just a utilitarian transporter, which is confirmed by its modern amenities.
